An initialized [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus] object.

Use this method when the user cancels the ride. This method sets the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isCanceled] property of the returned object to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and it sets the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isCompleted], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isMissedPickup], and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isOutstanding] properties to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

# canceledByUser()

**Type Method**

Creates an instance of this class that indicates the user canceled the ride.

## Declaration

```swift
class func canceledByUser() -> Self
```

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus] object.

## Discussion

Use this method when the user cancels the ride. This method sets the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isCanceled] property of the returned object to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and it sets the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isCompleted], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isMissedPickup], and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideCompletionStatus/isOutstanding] properties to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Creating a Ride Completion Status Object

- **completed()**: Creates an instance of this class that indicates the ride completed successfully.
- **completed(settled:)**: Creates an instance of this class that indicates the ride completed successfully and with the specified cost.
- **completed(outstanding:)**: Creates an instance of this class that indicates the ride completed successfully but still requires payment from the user.
- **completed(feedbackType:)**: Creates an instance of this class that indicates the ride completed successfully but still requires feedback from the user.
- **canceledByService()**: Creates an instance of this class that indicates your service canceled the ride.
- **canceledMissedPickup()**: Creates an instance of this class that indicates someone canceled the ride because of a missed pickup.
